object.name: Event
object.property: Events can be shown in calendars.

<model xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="location" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>label_event_location</title> </field> <field name="habilita_agenda_exercicio" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <default>True</default> <description>Se não, este evento será do prefeito em exercício.</description> <title>Este evento é do Prefeito?</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="start_date" type="zope.schema.Datetime"> <default>2017-03-03 00:00:00</default> <description/> <title>label_event_start</title> </field> <field name="end_date" type="zope.schema.Datetime"> <default>2017-03-03 00:00:00</default> <description/> <title>label_event_end</title> </field> <field name="text" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Text</title> </field> <field name="attendees" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>label_event_attendees</title> </field> <field name="event_url" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>help_url</description> <required>False</required> <title>event_more_information</title> </field> <field name="contact_name" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>label_contact_name</title> </field> <field name="contact_email" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>label_contact_email</title> </field> <field name="contact_phone" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>label_contact_phone</title> </field> </schema> </model>
